texts.biography: Lempo is a hunter by nature. Skillful in the arch, strategist and experienced in mobility, it traces its targets even in the most difficult terrain.
texts.name: Lempo

specialty.description: Hero movement bonus and no penalty in dirt and rough terrains. Start with visions.
specialty.name: Hunter Rune
specialty.tooltip: Hero movement bonus and no penalty in some terrains. Start with visions.
